gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਕਾਮ ਨਿਹਕਾਮ ਕੀਨੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ੳੁਦਮ ਨਿਰੁਦਮ ੳੁਕਤਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Soukhaphal Kaam Nihakaam Keenay , Gurmukhi Udam Nirudam Oukati Hai ?
translation: A disciple coming face to face of the Guru frees himself from all desires and wants by receiving the unique and comforting words of the True. Guru. Thus he frees himself from the worldly encumbrances with the strength of his meditation and consecration.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਾਰਗ ਹੁੲਿ ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਭਰਮ ਖੋੲੇ ਚਰਨ ਸਰਨਿ ਗਹੇ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਮਤਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Maarag Hui Doubidhaa Bharam Khoay , Charan Sarani Gahay Nihachal Mati Hai ?
translation: Treading the path of Guru, he destroys all his duality and doubts. The refuge of the True Guru makes his mind stable.

gurmukhi: ਦਰਸਨ ਪਰਸਤ ਅਾਸਾ ਮਨਸਾ ਥਕਿਤ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਪ੍ਰਾਨ ਪ੍ਰਾਨਪਤਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Darasan Parasat Aasaa Manasaa Dakita , Sabad Surati Giaan Praan Praanapati Hai ?
translation: By the glimpse of the True Guru, all his desires and sensualities get tired and become ineffective. Remembering the Lord with every breath, he becomes totally aware of the Lord, the master of our lives.

gurmukhi: ਰਚਨਾ ਚਰਿਤ੍ਰ ਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਬਿਸਮ ਬਚਿਤ੍ਰਪਨ ਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਮੈ ਚਿਤੇਰ੍ਰਾ ਕੋ ਬਸੇਰਾ ਸਤਿ ਸਤਿ ਹੈ ॥੨੮੨॥
transliteration: Rachanaa Charitr Chitr Bisam Bachitrapana , Chitr Mai Chitayrraa Ko Basayraa Sati Sati Hai ?282?
translation: The multiform creations of the Lord are wondrous and astonishing. The Guru-oriented disciple realises the presence of the Lord in this whole picture as true and eternal. (282)
